description: Face the cold and wet of winter head on. Lightweight construction and a supportive base keep you stable during fast and light missions in the snow. Zonal insulation and full water protection ensure feet stay warm and dry in powder or slush.Protective toecap and TPU mudguard add protection, and a TPU heel overlay stabilizes the foot.FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable.200g PrimaLoft® Silver Eco insulation is warm and lightweight.Gusseted tongue keeps snow out.Removable OrthoLite® footbed for underfoot comfort.Compression-moulded EVA midsole with ESS shank.Vibram® XS Trek rubber outsole grips winter snow and slush.
name: The North Face Ultra XC FUTURELIGHT Winter Boots - Men's
